D

DataHandler - Interface in helio.framework.materialiser.mappings
This class is meant to be implemented by objects that will handle pieces of data in a specific format, allowing the MaterialiserEngine to split data, and access specific pieces, in order to generate a final RDF document
DataNotProcessableException - Exception in helio.framework.exceptions
 
DataNotProcessableException(String, String) - Constructor for exception helio.framework.exceptions.DataNotProcessableException
 
DataProvider - Interface in helio.framework.materialiser.mappings
This class is meant to be implemented by objects that will provide pieces of data regardless their format, specifically, these implementations are meant to deal with the protocols and methods required to fetch the data.
DataSource - Class in helio.framework.materialiser.mappings
This class represents a source of data, which consist in a DataProvider that retrieves data from the source and a DataHandler that filters and retrieves only the relevant information from the fetched data-

MappingTranslator - Interface in helio.framework.materialiser
MappingTranslator is meant to create HelioMaterialiserMapping objects using different mapping specifications or formats
MaterialiserCache - Interface in helio.framework.materialiser
The MaterialiserCache is meant to be implemented by classes that allow the MaterialiserEngine to store copies of the generated RDF.
MaterialiserEngine - Interface in helio.framework.materialiser
MaterialiserEngine is meant to translate the data from a set of data sources into RDF, providing access to generated resources, or allowing to perform SPARQL queries.
